section.title: departments master list of Departments
section.para: To access the master list of Departments, select the "Departments" option. The following screen will appear:
The Departments master list displays information on all Departments, including Department number and Department name.
To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for adding a new Department to the master list of Departments.

Enables you to edit highlighted Department definitions. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Department definition--except that when editing, the fields will contain Department information. Double-clicking on a Department definition will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Department definition and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Department definition and then select this button to remove the Department from the master list. You may only delete Departments if they are not being used.
